name: NANO DRONE
description:
A Game by Pixellated Hammered Raccoon!

Evanski,   Pixel-Team,   Kenneth Burkhart of Firehammer Games

For the GMC JAM 48

Get ready for an epic adventure of life and death! The Nanobots, a groundbreaking technology that was supposed to cure all illnesses, has turned into a dangerous weapon due to a software glitch. Fear not, because there is still hope with the Nano Drone! Pilot the Nano Drone and venture into your own body to restore the Nanobots and defeat the deadly viruses that are threatening your very existence. Are you ready to take on the ultimate challenge? It's time to show your courage and prove that you are the cure! The fate of your life lies in your hands. Are you up for the challenge?

X-input is fully supported, Direct-Input might work, Any 3rd Party Will not work

ControlsKeyboardControllerMovementW A S D Left StickAimMouseRight StickShootLeft ClickRight Shoulder buttonsMenu InteractAny KeyStart
